mapper.select: SELECT (select sum(sl) from rpt_aqjg_ggjt_dljtytgltj where lx = '1' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 企业总量, (select sum(sl) from rpt_aqjg_ggjt_dljtytgltj where lx = '2' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 重点车辆数, (select sum(sl) from rpt_aqjg_ggjt_dljtytgltj where lx = '3' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 重点人员数, (SELECT sum(yhzl) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_yhlxtj WHERE year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 隐患发现量, (SELECT sum(yhwcsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_yhlxtj WHERE year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 隐患处理量, (SELECT sum(yhwwcsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_yhlxtj WHERE year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 隐患待处理量, (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_wfdj_jcxx WHERE lxdm = '1' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 执法总数量, (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_wfdj_jcxx WHERE lxdm = '3' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 报警, (SELECT sum(wfs) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_zdwf WHERE lxdm = '1' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 国省道重点违法, (SELECT sum(wfs) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_zdwf WHERE lxdm = '2' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 农村公路重点违法, (SELECT sum(wfs) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_zdwf WHERE lxdm = '3' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 两客一危重点违法, (SELECT sum(wfs) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_zdwf WHERE lxdm = '4' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 货车超载非法改装, (SELECT sum(wfs) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_zdwf WHERE lxdm = '5' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 酒驾醉驾, (SELECT sum(wfs) FROM rpt_aqjg_ggjt_zdwf WHERE lxdm = '6' AND year = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy')) as 假套牌

SELECT (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_czfsl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 出租房总量, (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 群租房总量, (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrksl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 流动人口总量, (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzwzdr WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 重点人口总量, (select sum(yhs) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhsj where tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 治安隐患发现量, (select sum(zgs) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhsj where tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 治安隐患处理量, (SELECT yhs-zgs as 治安隐患待处理量 FROM (select sum(yhs) yhs,sum(zgs) zgs FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhsj where tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) t), (select sum(yhs) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsj where tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 非治安隐患发现量, (select sum(zgs) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsj where tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 非治安隐患处理量, (SELECT yhs-zgs as 非治安隐患待处理量 FROM (select sum(yhs) yhs,sum(zgs) zgs FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsj where tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) t), (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhczwsj WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 隐患出租屋, (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfsj WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 隐患群租房, (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_czfsl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 出租房屋数, (SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 群租房屋数

SELECT (select sum(dwsl) from rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl where tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 企业单位总数, (SELECT sum(dwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl WHERE jbdjdm IN ('1','2','3','8') AND tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 重点单位总数, (SELECT sum(dwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 重要设施总数, (SELECT sum(zddwcyrys) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zddwtj WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 重点单位人员数, (SELECT sum(yhsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_yhsl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 隐患发现量, (SELECT sum(yhcldwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhdwtj WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as 隐患处理量, (SELECT yhsl-yhcldwsl as 隐患待处理量 FROM (SELECT (SELECT sum(yhsl) yhsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_yhsl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')), (SELECT sum(yhcldwsl) yhcldwsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhdwtj WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) t)

SELECT jbdjmc, sum(zddwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zddwtj WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND jbdj in('1','2','3','8') AND ssfxj NOT IN ( '320597000000', '320598000000') AND qy IS NOT NULL GROUP BY jbdjmc ORDER BY sum desc
